类 CShape

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.shapes.CShape
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable
直接已知子类:
CRect, CTriangle
public abstract class CShape extends Object implements Drawable
An abstract class representing a customizable shape with properties for fill color, outline color, and outline thickness. It provides methods for rendering, checking point containment, and scaling. Subclasses must implement methods for converting to a Java AWT Shape and scaling the shape. Implements the Drawable interface.
另请参阅:
  • Drawable

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CShape

      public CShape(Color fillColor, Color outlineColor, double outlineThickness)
      Constructs a CShape with specified fill color, outline color, and outline thickness.
      参数:
      fillColor - the fill color of the shape, or null for no fill
      outlineColor - the outline color of the shape, or null for no outline
      outlineThickness - the thickness of the outline, in pixels

    • CShape

      public CShape()
      Constructs a CShape with no fill, no outline, and an outline thickness of 0.0.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getFillColor

      public Color getFillColor()
      Returns the fill color of the shape.
      返回:
      the fill color, or null if no fill is applied

    • setFillColor

      public void setFillColor(Color fillColor)
      Sets the fill color of the shape.
      参数:
      fillColor - the new fill color, or null for no fill

    • getOutlineColor

      public Color getOutlineColor()
      Returns the outline color of the shape.
      返回:
      the outline color, or null if no outline is applied

    • setOutlineColor

      public void setOutlineColor(Color outlineColor)
      Sets the outline color of the shape.
      参数:
      outlineColor - the new outline color, or null for no outline

    • getOutlineThickness

      public double getOutlineThickness()
      Returns the thickness of the shape's outline.
      返回:
      the outline thickness in pixels

    • setOutlineThickness

      public void setOutlineThickness(double outlineThickness)
      Sets the thickness of the shape's outline.
      参数:
      outlineThickness - the new outline thickness in pixels

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the shape onto the provided Graphics2D object. The method draws the fill and outline of the shape based on the current properties.
      指定者:
      render 在接口中 Drawable
      参数:
      g2d - the graphics context used for rendering

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Point p)
      Determines if the specified point is contained within the shape.
      参数:
      p - the point to test
      返回:
      true if the point is inside the shape; false otherwise

    • toJShape

      public abstract Shape toJShape()
      Converts the shape to a Java AWT Shape object. This method must be implemented by subclasses to define the shape.
      返回:
      the AWT Shape representation of the shape

    • scale

      public abstract void scale(Dimension d)
      Scales the shape according to the given dimensions. This method must be implemented by subclasses to define scaling behavior.
      参数:
      d - the dimensions used for scaling
